entities.name: hermione

entities.name: harry

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A person who lives in a strange-looking house on the hill.

relationships.description: Ron is accompanied by Harry as they climb the hill.
Ron is accompanied by Hermione as they climb the hill.
Harry is pointed at by Ron, who is pointing out Luna's house.
Hermione disagrees with Ron about the shape of Luna's house.
Ron points at Luna's house, which he believes belongs to her.
